meta.title: 香港的Web3&區塊鏈解決方案供應商 | 0xBlanc
meta.description: 0xBlanc為您提供一站式Web3.0技術解決方案，即時開始NFT、智能合約開發，連動區塊鏈打造專屬您項目的網頁，再配合搜尋引擎優化（SEO），將貴品牌的DApp輕鬆呈現於客戶眼前。並以Web3.0專案提升品牌形象，搶佔去中心化應用程式先機。
meta.keywords: web3, blockchain, solana, ethereum, nft, technical service, minting site, website hosting, nft launching, nft generation, 區塊鏈, 以太坊

Hero.title: 釋放區塊鏈的無限可能

AboutUs.title: 關於我們
AboutUs.content: 0xBlanc是由一群熱愛區塊鏈及Web3技術的年輕人所組成的，我們的目標是以技術人員和設計師人才，為項目提供區塊鏈相關的諮詢和服務。如果您想開始NFT項目開發、DApp開發、自定義智能合約開發、將Web3技術整合至現有業務之中或需要傳統網站託管服務，那麼這裡就是正確的選擇。

content.pre: Avoid implementing template designs. 0xBlanc offers you customized

services.name: Landing Page

services.name: E-Commerce
services.description: Launch your e-commerce website and sell your products online with product, customer managing & payment system.

faqs.question: How to start a project?
faqs.answer: You can contact us with email or send us a direct message with instagram or telegram! Let’s discuss what you need and we with offer you a quotation within 24 hours!

faqs.question: What do I need to prepare for creating a website?
faqs.answer: Please provide us with your logo, color scheme, and content. But don’t worry if you don’t have any of these, we will discuss with you and try to make the best design for you!

faqs.question: Why choose 0xBlanc?
faqs.answer: 0xBlanc provide you with a unique design with delightful user experience, good starter SEO implementation, and also include analytics tools to help you monitor your website! Our team will also provide you high-quality 1-on-1 support and consultation.

faqs.question: When will my website be done?
faqs.answer: We generally take 2-3 weeks to complete a website. The entire website design process is starting from consultation, analyze your needs, confirm quotations to web design, testing and publish online. But if you need it done faster, we can discuss with you and try to meet your deadline!

faqs.question: How to make the payment?
faqs.answer: In most cases, 60% of the payment is required before the project starts. 20% is required before the UAT is delivered. The remaining 20% is required before deployment.
